DescriptionData.Title: Pride Socks - Womens Rainbow Striped Business Socks - Black
DescriptionData.Description: These black rainbow striped crew socks are great for adding a splash of color to any business outfit. The socks have rainbow stripes of red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple at the top of each socks and the text "PRIDESOCKS" printed in white on the toes of each sock. The socks are sized for women, will fit women's shoe size 5-10 and will be 1/2 to 3/4 to knee high for most. 82% Ring Spun Cotton, 10% Polyester, 4% Acrylic, 2% Spandex, 2% Nylon and made in the USA.
